alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 5:08PM EDT until September 24 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Albemarle, Croatan, and Pamlico Sounds, Alligator River, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas along the Pamlico Sound, Pungo and lower Pamlico Rivers. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
